name: Monster Storm
description:
This game is made for Mini Jam #26 Storms.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Aim (Horizontal) with mouse cursor.

LMB to shoot.

R to reload.

Score is on top left.

Ammo is on top right.

If your score reaches a certain amount you get a new weapon.

You get a sandstorm every around 30 seconds.
